56
GIFTS AND ENTRY INTO INHERITANCE RIGHTS
(1) Gifts given to a person in place of whom another heir has entered into inheritance rights due to that person's unworthiness or because he or she has been disinherited or dispossessed of his or her statutory portion shall not be included in the hereditary portion.
(2) Gifts given to a person in place of whom another heir has entered into inheritance rights due to that person's death or the renunciation of his or her inheritance shall be included in the heir's hereditary portion.
